features.title: Everything you need to hire with confidence
features.subtitle: We provide everything you need to streamline your hiring workflow

feature1.title: Centralized Hiring Hub
feature1.text: Manage all your hiring activities in one place. From posting jobs to scheduling interviews, Zamdit simplifies your hiring workflow, allowing your team to collaborate easily, track candidate progress, and share notes, all within one dashboard.

feature2.title: Fast and Automated Hiring Processes
feature2.text: Move candidates through the hiring process faster than ever. Automated assessments, reminders, and streamlined approvals save valuable time, so your team can focus on making the right hiring decisions.

feature3.title: Thorough Candidate Evaluations
feature3.text: Make hiring decisions with confidence using tools for in-depth candidate evaluations. Use Zamdit's customizable scorecards, detailed comparison tools, and automated evaluation summaries to deeply analyze candidate suitability.

feature4.title: No-Code Career Portal Builder
feature4.text: Attract quality talent with a branded, no-code career portal. Easily create and update your portal to showcase open positions, company culture, and growth opportunities to stand out in a competitive hiring landscape.
